short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make those pesky Lokalise notifications disappear

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Annoyed by Lokalise's never ending notifications? Clear them all at once with this simple extension!

Just install the extension, open it with the Lokalise tab opened, and click the Clear button.
